title: Businessweek Talks- Sinovation Ventures CEO Kai-Fu Lee
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks- Sinovation Ventures CEO Kai-Fu Lee
description:
Kai-Fu Lee, Chairman and CEO of Sinovation Ventures, discusses his book "AI 2041: Ten Visions For Our Future.” Lee speaks with Bloomberg Businessweek anchor Tim Stenovec in the latest edition of Businessweek Talks.

Host: Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brenan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
